art.author: newell
art.post: A few years back, I either had a dream. I was standing in a stair landing in a large city looking down onto a street. A gentleman dressed in a suit walked past me and looked at me. I thought I had seen an angel. Then the shroud program came on the History Channel. The man I saw in my dream was the same but the one I saw was clean shaven. The reason I can tell you this is that when the dream happened, I wrote it down in my diary as I have each time something happens that I believe may be godly..
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
